questions.question: What are the main border crossings between Timor-Leste and NTT?
questions.answer: Batugade-Mota'ain, Salele-Wini, Oesilo-Bobometo

questions.question: What is the main port in Timor-Leste mentioned in the module?
questions.answer: Dili

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a common challenge in border control procedures?
questions.answer: Excessive staffing at customs checkpoints

questions.question: What is a single window system in the context of trade facilitation?
choices: A system that allows only one vehicle to cross the border at a time
A platform that allows traders to submit all required documentation through a single entry point
A window at the customs office where all traders must queue
A system that limits trade to a single product category
questions.answer: A platform that allows traders to submit all required documentation through a single entry point

questions.question: Which countries are mentioned as examples of successful implementation of single window systems?
questions.answer: Singapore and South Korea

questions.question: What is the purpose of risk management approaches in border control?
choices: To increase the number of inspections
To focus resources on high-risk consignments while efficiently processing low-risk goods
To create more paperwork for customs officials
questions.answer: To focus resources on high-risk consignments while efficiently processing low-risk goods

questions.question: What does the harmonization of standards and procedures between neighboring countries involve?
choices: Aligning customs documentation requirements and adopting common product standards
Implementing stricter regulations for all imports
questions.answer: Aligning customs documentation requirements and adopting common product standards

questions.question: What is the main airport in Timor-Leste mentioned in the module?
questions.answer: Presidente Nicolau Lobato International Airport

questions.question: What is the main airport in NTT mentioned in the module?
questions.answer: El Tari International Airport

questions.question: What does the term 'intermodal transportation' refer to?
choices: Using only one mode of transport
The seamless integration of different transport modes
Using only air transport for international trade
questions.answer: The seamless integration of different transport modes

questions.question: What are sanitary and phytosanitary (SPS) measures designed to protect?
questions.answer: Human, animal, and plant health

questions.question: What is a potential risk of overly stringent SPS regulations?
questions.answer: Becoming significant non-tariff barriers

questions.question: What is the main goal of trade facilitation?
choices: To reduce the time and cost associated with cross-border trade
To eliminate all trade between countries
To increase bureaucracy in customs procedures
questions.answer: To reduce the time and cost associated with cross-border trade

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a component of transport connectivity?
questions.answer: Shopping malls

questions.question: What is the benefit of using non-intrusive inspection technologies in border control?
choices: It increases the time needed for inspections
It allows for more efficient processing of goods
It eliminates the need for any inspections
It increases the cost of border control
questions.answer: It allows for more efficient processing of goods

questions.question: What regional cooperation initiative is mentioned as an example of harmonizing standards and procedures?
questions.answer: ASEAN Single Window

questions.question: What is the potential benefit of upgrading the road network between Dili and Kupang?

Less trade between the two regions

questions.question: What role do modern border facilities equipped with advanced technologies play?

They expedite customs clearance while maintaining necessary security measures
questions.answer: They expedite customs clearance while maintaining necessary security measures

questions.question: What is the benefit of training border officials in customer service and risk assessment techniques?
choices: It contributes to more efficient and trade-friendly border management
It eliminates the need for documentation checks

Boosted maritime trade and reduced reliance on distant transshipment hubs

questions.question: What is the purpose of developing intermodal hubs?
choices: To focus exclusively on road transport
To create more efficient and flexible logistics networks

questions.question: What is the main challenge of complex customs procedures?

They eliminate the need for border controls
questions.answer: They complicate trade and increase delays

questions.question: What is the benefit of mutual recognition of certifications between countries?

It reduces the compliance burden on traders

questions.question: What is the purpose of pest risk assessments in the context of SPS measures?

questions.question: What is the potential impact of improved transport connectivity on local communities?

questions.question: What is the purpose of joint border patrols between neighboring countries?
questions.answer: To improve coordination and security

questions.question: What is the potential benefit of simplified visa procedures for business travelers?
